text: N’igihe (yewe Muhamadi) uzaba uri kumwe na bo (ku rugamba), ukabayobora mu iswala, icyo gihe itsinda rimwe muri bo rijye rihagararana na we mu iswala rinagumane intwaro zaryo. Nirimara kubama, rijye rijya inyuma yanyu mu birindiro, nuko haze irindi tsinda ritarasali naryo risali hamwe nawe, kandi ribe menge rinagumane intwaro zaryo. Abahakanye bifuza ko mwarangara mukibagirwa intwaro zanyu n’imitwaro yanyu bakabagwa gitumo. Ariko nta kosa kuri mwe gushyira intwaro hasi igihe mufite imbogamizi z’imvura cyangwa murwaye, gusa mukaba menge. Mu by’ukuri, Allah yateguriye abahakanyi ibihano bisuzuguza
